main event: Mrs. [Redacted] and four others spotted a round, silver object the size of a C-47 while fishing on the Rogue River near Gold Beach, Oregon on 24 May 1949.
interesting points: The object was first seen about three or four miles away,The object made no noise and left no exhaust trail,The object turned from east to southwest during the sighting,The estimated speed of the object was comparable to that of a C-47,Colonel informed that the area was not covered by radar at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a round, silver object approximately the size of a C-47
